predictions.text: U.S. JOLTS job openings (level, seasonally adjusted) for September 2025 will print between 7.3 million and 8.3 million in the BLS release due by 2025-11-06.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in BLS JOLTS news release (Table 1). Condition met if the reported total job openings level (seasonally adjusted) for September 2025 is ≥7.3 million and ≤8.3 million.
monitoring_signals: Weekly initial and continuing jobless claims
predictions.rationale: Labor demand is cooling but remains resilient; range captures moderation without sharp deterioration.

predictions.text: Alphabet (GOOGL) Q3 2025 Google Cloud revenue year-over-year growth will be between 17% and 24%, per the company’s earnings release published by 2025-10-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use Alphabet’s Q3 2025 press release/10-Q. Compute YoY growth for Google Cloud segment revenue versus Q3 2024 reported revenue.
monitoring_signals: Reported Azure and AWS growth rates
Cloud capex commentary from suppliers (e.g., Broadcom)
predictions.rationale: AI-driven cloud demand is firm, but price competition and optimization temper growth.

predictions.text: Amazon (AMZN) Q3 2025 AWS revenue year-over-year growth will be between 16% and 22%, per the company’s earnings release published by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use Amazon’s Q3 2025 earnings release. Compare AWS revenue to Q3 2024 to calculate YoY growth.
monitoring_signals: GenAI service adoption (Bedrock, custom silicon uptake)
predictions.rationale: GenAI demand supports mid-to-high teens growth amid ongoing cost optimizations at customers.

predictions.text: Meta Platforms (META) Q3 2025 Reality Labs operating loss will be between $3.0B and $4.5B, per the company’s earnings release by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in Meta’s Q3 2025 press release/10-Q. Use the reported Reality Labs operating loss (GAAP).
evidence: Historical pattern of substantial Reality Labs losses and continued investment cadence (company guidance).
monitoring_signals: Meta capex and opex guidance for RL
Device launch timelines and unit momentum
Hiring and R&D disclosures for AR/VR
predictions.rationale: Sustained AR/VR investment keeps RL losses elevated despite efficiency efforts.

predictions.text: Euro area Industrial Production (MoM, SA) for September 2025 will print between -0.8% and +0.4% in Eurostat’s release due by 2025-11-13.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use Eurostat’s Industrial Production release. Check the month-over-month, seasonally adjusted headline percentage for September 2025.
monitoring_signals: Export orders and China demand indicators
predictions.rationale: Manufacturing remains soft amid de-risking and external demand headwinds; energy costs add volatility.

predictions.text: At the meeting concluding 2025-11-06, the Bank of England will leave Bank Rate unchanged at 5.25%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm via BoE Monetary Policy Summary on 2025-11-06. Condition met if the policy rate remains at 5.25%.
evidence: Risk-off positioning and growth concerns curb appetite for near-term hikes (401k rotation to cash/bonds): https://www.cnbc.com/2025/10/13/401k-investors-move-to-cash-bonds-in-september.html
monitoring_signals: Wage growth and labor market tightness
BoE member speeches and vote splits
predictions.rationale: Sticky services inflation vs weak growth skews to holding steady while awaiting more data.

predictions.text: The PBOC will set the 1-year MLF rate unchanged at 2.50% at its next fixing on or before 2025-11-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify the 1-year MLF rate on the PBOC website/newswire on the next fixing before or on 2025-11-15. Condition met if it remains 2.50%.
monitoring_signals: USD/CNH levels and FX stability considerations
TSF credit flows and loan demand
predictions.rationale: Growth support is balanced against FX stability; targeted tools preferred over benchmark cuts near-term.

predictions.text: EIA-reported crude oil stocks at Cushing, OK will decrease by at least 2.5 million barrels week-over-week in at least one Weekly Petroleum Status Report published by 2025-11-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report. Condition met if any report before or on 2025-11-15 shows Cushing total stocks change ≤ -2.5 million barrels vs prior week.
evidence: Global shipping disruptions and rerouting can intermittently tighten inland balances: https://www.cnbc.com/2025/10/13/israel-gaza-ceasefire-red-sea-freight-containerships.html
monitoring_signals: WTI prompt time spreads (CL1-CL2) and Midland-Cushing differentials
predictions.rationale: Seasonal runs and pipeline dynamics can produce a sizable weekly Cushing draw even in balanced markets.

predictions.text: The Drewry World Container Index Shanghai–Rotterdam weekly spot rate published on or before 2025-11-30 will be at least 20% higher than its 2025-09-05 reading.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compare the published WCI Shanghai–Rotterdam spot rate on or before 2025-11-30 to the value from 2025-09-05. Condition met if current ≥ 1.20 × 2025-09-05.
monitoring_signals: Suez/Red Sea transit risk and rerouting
predictions.rationale: Persistent Red Sea risk and new port fees support elevated Transatlantic/Europe-bound rates.

predictions.text: AAA U.S. national average regular gasoline price will print at or below $3.25 per gallon on at least one daily reading by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check AAA daily national average regular gas price. Condition met if any day on or before 2025-11-30 shows ≤ $3.25.
evidence: Post-summer seasonal demand softness; consumer stress: https://www.cnbc.com/2025/10/13/new-car-prices-auto-loan-delinquencies.html
Risk-off tone and slower growth expectations: https://www.cnbc.com/2025/10/13/401k-investors-move-to-cash-bonds-in-september.html
monitoring_signals: RBOB futures and gasoline crack spreads
EIA gasoline inventories and product supplied
predictions.rationale: Seasonality, softer demand, and stable crude increase odds of sub-$3.25 national average prints.

predictions.text: China CPI (headline, YoY) for October 2025 will print between -0.2% and +0.8% in the National Bureau of Statistics release by 2025-11-10.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use NBS release for October 2025 CPI (YoY, headline). Condition met if YoY change is ≥ -0.2% and ≤ +0.8%.
monitoring_signals: China food price indices and pork prices
predictions.rationale: Muted domestic demand and weak PPI keep headline inflation subdued within a narrow band.

predictions.text: NFIB Small Business Optimism Index for October 2025 will print between 90.0 and 93.0 in the release due by 2025-11-12.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in NFIB’s October 2025 report. Condition met if the headline Small Business Optimism Index is ≥ 90.0 and ≤ 93.0.
monitoring_signals: NFIB hiring plans and compensation intentions
ISM new orders and regional Fed surveys
predictions.rationale: Higher-for-longer rates and soft demand cap sentiment; no abrupt deterioration expected.

predictions.text: ISM Manufacturing New Orders Index for October 2025 will print between 47.0 and 51.0 in ISM’s release due by 2025-11-01.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use ISM October 2025 Manufacturing report; check the New Orders subindex. Condition met if it falls within 47.0–51.0.
monitoring_signals: S&P Global Manufacturing PMI new orders
Regional Fed new orders (Philly, Empire, Richmond, Dallas)
predictions.rationale: Manufacturing demand remains near the expansion/contraction boundary amid restrictive financial conditions.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, Taiwan’s MOD will report at least one 24-hour period with 70 or more PRC military aircraft detected around Taiwan.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm using daily releases from Taiwan’s Ministry of National Defense. Condition met if any 24-hour period shows ≥70 PRC aircraft detected.
evidence: Heightened US–China tech/trade frictions elevate PLA activity as signaling.
monitoring_signals: Daily Taiwan MOD air activity reports
PRC maritime and air exercises announcements
US/ally transits and FONOPs in Taiwan Strait
predictions.rationale: Escalatory signaling remains plausible amid intensified tech/trade frictions and regional exercises.
